item.title: Neo-Nazi leader Thomas Sewell in second bid for release over camp attack
item.description: <p>An avowed Neo-Nazi leader has made a second bail bid after allegedly leading a group attack on an Aboriginal protest site, with his fiancée putting up $20,000 to secure his release.</p>

item.title: Driver charged after death of 'caring' young father in alleged hit-run
item.description: <p>A driver has been arrested after the death of a young father in an alleged hit-run in Adelaide&#x27;s north last night.</p>

item.title: 'Drop crocs': Evidence of ancient crocodiles that climbed trees found in rural Queensland
item.description: <p>&quot;﻿They were perhaps hunting like leopards, dropping out of trees on any unsuspecting thing they fancied for dinner.&quot;</p>

item.title: Kyle, Jackie O avoid charges over Erin Patterson mushroom trial remark
item.description: <p>The KIIS FM breakfast show hosts were referred to the Victorian Office of Public Prosecutions on June 16 after Sandilands made on-air comments about the case.</p>
